column2: Dataset: WESTWALL-1993
Data From (Title): (i) Combat History Analysis Effort (CHASE)

column3: Data Enhancement Study (CDES), and (ii) Data Base Error

column2: Author: Historical Evaluation and Research Organization.
Organization: Data Memory Systems, Inc.
Address: Fairfax, VA.
Publication Date: 31 January 1986.
Classification: UNCLASSIFIED.
Source Available From: DTIC as AD-A175 712 through AD-A 175 716, and
Prepared By: Dr. Robert L. Helmbold, US Army Concepts Analysis Agency
Spreadsheet last revised: 30 October 1993
Begin (Date & Time)
Date
1.  Start and end dates and times from "Engagement Durations," pg
51, Vol IV, CDES Report.
2.  Strength & loss from "Task 8: Development of Strength and
Attrition Histories for Selected Battles," pp 125-129, Vol V, CDES
Report.
3.  The action after 06-Oct-44, 18:30 was not the same as before.
Narrative for Westwall on pg 160 of Vol V of HERO Battle Data Base
Report states that "On 6 October, despite the defensive efforts of
German reserves, the attack broke through the first band of the
Westwall, and on the following day (7 October) made sweeping
gains."
4.  The parameters A, D, lam, and reinf/repl rate are all per hour.
